verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [V: asked] [ARG0: by a reporter] [ARG1: if he will invite Kim Jong Un to Washington D.C.] , [ARG2: President Donald Trump] said , " Absolutely , I will . " The two leaders also signed an agreement after which Trump called the North Korean leader a " very smart negotiator . "
